title: Richard Bacon: 'My ADHD is who I am'
content: This video can not be playedFormer BBC Radio 5 live <https://www.bbc.co.uk/5live> presenter Richard Bacon has been diagnosed with ADHD at 42.He told 5 live Breakfast that he “wouldn’t change it for the world”.“I like having it a lot; it is who I am. It’s just learning to work with it and manage it means that life gets less chaotic and painful for my wife and children.”
